QuestData.Title: Welcome to Stormwind
QuestData.Description:
Now that we are back in Stormwind, I need to deliver my mission report to King Wrynn.
In the meantime, I've asked Lindie to accompany you around the city. There's a lot to see and do in Stormwind, so feel free to explore at your leisure.
I'll send for you once I've delivered my report to the king.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Lindie Springstock at the city gate.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Lindie Springstock at the city gate.
